page.title: 10FARMERS' JOBS
page.content: In our area there are lots of farms.We visited some of them.They were the Smiths' Farm,the Taylors' Farm and the Griffiths' Farm.The Smiths' and the Taylors' farms are in Northend and the Griffiths' Farm is in Knightcote.The Smiths Farm is quite big and it is 700 years old.On the farm Mr and Mrs Smith have to do lots of jobs.These are some of them:feeding the animals,spraying the crops,taking the animals to market and buying and selling animals.For most farms the farmer has more jobs to do in the summer.The Griffiths' farm is hundreds of years old.The different thing about the Griffiths' Farm is that Mr. Griffiths owns the farm but someone else works on it.The Taylors' farm house is 330 years old.All the farmers we met were concerned with different types of farming.
